query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') as mes, SUM(totalAmount) as total FROM revenues WHERE date >= '2024-06-01' AND date <= '2026-05-31' GROUP BY mes ORDER BY mes;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Nu3CCYNdQAot2p.ed39d223acf8 --database 9XTkf5bsLGbTdekU6pH9wY --execute SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') as mes, SUM(totalAmount) as total FROM revenues WHERE date >= '2024-06-01' AND date <= '2026-05-31' GROUP BY mes ORDER BY mes;
